message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds immense value. Given its unique features and benefits, we're extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value and other similar products available.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. We appreciate your feedback and understand your perspective. However, given the exceptional quality and uniqueness of this item, we would like to propose a price of $12000. This reflects a fair compromise between our valuation and market considerations.

I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at $11500? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing the product at this price.

We're glad to hear that you're committed to acquiring our product, Bob. Considering the high demand and the value we place on customer satisfaction, we've decided to adjust our position slightly. We're willing to negotiate at $11800 for the product. We hope this aligns better with your expectations while still reflecting the value we see in it.
